en.header-text: With professional team you will receive professional service!
en.about-text: Freight forwarding company IE "Nesibeli Ädim" is engaged in the organization of cargo transportation, customs clearance, cargo storage and transit services in the port of Turkmenbashi

en.custom-text: With a well-organized work, a quick way to obtain the appropriate customs clearance
en.storage-text: Help with the safety of your goods in the territory of Turkmenistan
en.transit-text: Reliable service of escorting your cargo in transit
en.address-text: "Nesibeli Ädim" Individual Enterprise, Turkmenistan, Ashgabat, Bagtyyarlyk etrap, Hero of Turkmenistan Atamurat Niyazov Avenue, 391 (Choganly)

ru.header-text: С профессиональной командой вы получите профессиональное обслуживание!
ru.about-text: Транспортно-экспедиторская компания ИП "Nesibeli ädim" занимается организацией перевозки грузов, таможенные оформления, хранения грузов и услуги по транзиту в порту Туркменбаши.
